name: Immune war (wangnima666)
description:
Build your immune army,select them, arrange them, and destroy the pathogens.
You can generate the immune cells like macrophage,natural killer cell,dendritic cell and so on.
Once you kill all the enemys,you will win the battle.

FEATURES
1. There are 10 interesting campaigns for you to play.
2. Skirmish is alse a good choice,you can set enemy type and the difficulty.
3. 5 types of immune cells, more than 8 types of pathogenes including bacteria,virus and cancer.
4. Support 13 languages.
